front.title: •••Ortolan
front.gametext: Power and forfeit +2 on Hoth or at Dining Room. While at a marker site, cumulatively adds 1 to number of Hoth sites required for opponent to gain a Force drain bonus from Walker Garrison.
front.lore: Squat, floppy-eared food lovers. Ortolans come from the frigid planet Orto. Communicate above the auditory range of most species.

pulledBy: Nar Shaddaa Wind Chimes & Out Of Somewhere
